name: Kill Fish
storyline: Kill Fish is a game about a man who tries to change and get away from his past, but instead repeats the same mistakes over and over again. Try on the skin of a tired, emaciated and practically lost hope hero, and reveal all the secrets of the mysterious place in which you find yourself.
summary: A psychedelic and confusing story set in an oppressive and dark environment. The gameplay is challenging like platformer, action and puzzle.
